doc:
Florence Halop https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Florence_Halop 0 Florence Halop (January 23, 1923 – July 15, 1986) was an American actress. Best known for her roles as surly patient Mrs. Hufnagel on the drama St. Elsewhere and the raspy-voiced bailiff Florence Kleiner on the sitcom Night Court, Halop was the sister of Billy Halop, one of the original Dead End/East Side Kids. Florence_Halop ( January_23_,_1923 – July_15_,_1986 ) was an_American_actress . Best known for her_roles as surly_patient_Mrs._Hufnagel on the_drama_St._Elsewhere and the_raspy-voiced_bailiff_Florence_Kleiner on the_sitcom_Night_Court , Halop was the_sister of Billy_Halop , one of the_original_Dead_End/East_Side_Kids .
